title: [Large-scale] Integrated Teaching Methodology for ESL Scientific Paper Writing Based on Digital Media

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Grammar and Understanding of Scientific Terminology
context.additional_context: Digital tool application and personalized learning path design for scientific English academic writing

learning_goals: ESL learners can draft scientific English papers using digital media tools.
Learners receive personalized feedback tailored to their language proficiency level at least three times via a mobile platform based on programmatic instruction.
Learners can complete project-based assessment tasks, including peer reviews, using digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
